author: admin
title: Mazamer Al Daoud
content: Student Yousef Mohammed’s win in first place in the learning difficulties category at the Mazamer Al Daoud competition held at the International Preparatory Academy.

author: admin
title: An Event to Honor the Winning Students in the Individual Incentive System, ‘Ghursha and Teela,’ for the Week of March 24th, 2024.
content: With pride and gratitude, the school honored the winning students as a testament to their perseverance and excellence. Al-Tamkan Inclusive School celebrated an event to recognize the outstanding students in the ‘Ghursha and Teela’ Individual Incentive System for the previous week. These exceptional students stood out with their creativity and remarkable achievements, their efforts were acknowledged, and they were motivated to continue excelling in the future.

title: The Garangao Festival at Our School

author: admin
title: Our students’ participation in the ‘Read Me a Story’ competition
content: An outstanding achievement penned by our young heroes! The school is proud of our students’ participation in the ‘Read Me a Story’ competition.

title: Save Blessings Initiative
content: Dear ladies and gentlemen, Greetings and blessings be upon you as we launch the Save Blessings Initiative.

author: admin
title: Al-Tamakon Comprehensive School has obtained the international certification and membership in CIS
content: We are pleased to announce that Al-Tamakon Comprehensive School has received international certification and membership in CIS.

title: The Comprehensive AL Tamakon School and Harvard University form a strategic partnership
content: This partnership will bring new opportunities and programs to enhance our students’ learning experience.

title: Parent-Teacher Evaluative Meeting: Assessing Student Performance at the Comprehensive AL Tamakon School
content: At the Comprehensive AL Tamakon School, we are dedicated to closely monitoring student performance and ensuring quality education.

title: Celebrating the International Day of Nations
content: The Comprehensive AlTamakon School celebrated the International Day of Nations with cultural activities on November 16, 2023.

title: Little Muezzin competition
content: Al-Takmin School is keen on community partnership with schools and celebrated the Little Muezzin competition.

author: admin
title: Al Tamakon Comprehensive School’s participation in the Fasila Competition
content: Al Tamakon Comprehensive School’s participation in the Fasila Competition with the theme: ‘If the Final Hour comes while you have a shoot of a plant in your hands, continue planting it.’
